meanings.sent1: She was chary of strangers, always checking her surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The chary cat cautiously approached the new toy in the room.
meanings.sent3: The chary squirrel eyed the acorn with suspicion before deciding to bury it.
meanings.sent4: The chary student carefully navigated through the tricky exam questions.
meanings.sent5: The chary explorer scanned the dense forest for any signs of danger.

meanings.sent1: He felt chary about accepting the offer without knowing all the details.
meanings.sent2: The chary child hesitated before jumping into the pool for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The chary shopper debated whether to buy the expensive item or not.
meanings.sent4: The chary driver was unsure about taking the unfamiliar shortcut.
meanings.sent5: The chary employee was reluctant to speak up during the meeting.
